note.p: Education: Guy's Hospital, London; Christ's College, Cambridge. BSc (1873), BA (1876), MA (1879); DSc (1879, London)

Career: Studied medicine, but gave it up; Fellow and Lecturer of Christ's College, Cambridge (1876-1888); Reader in Botany, Cambridge University (1883-1888); Examiner in Botany, University of London; Sherardian Professor of Botany, University of Oxford (1888-1919)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1932-1935 vol l pp 185-188, plate, by Alfred Barton Rendle.
n.b. forename spelt "Sidney" on Election Certificate, but this appears to be an error - spelt "Sydney" in all other instances
